akn:section.akn:heading: Continued availability of appropriated funds for direct real estate loans to farmers and ranchers

akn:content.akn:p: § 1930. Continued availability of appropriated funds for direct real estate loans to farmers and ranchers Funds appropriated for the purpose of making direct real estate loans to farmers and ranchers under this subchapter shall remain available until expended. (Pub. L. 87–128, title III, § 310, as added Pub. L. 91–524, title VIII, § 806(b), Nov. 30, 1970, 84 Stat. 1383.)
